gitCommit.subject: Complete Playwright implementation with all tests passing and documentation
gitCommit.body:
Complete Playwright implementation with all tests passing and documentation

Co-authored-by: jakub-podhorny <243822208+jakub-podhorny@users.noreply.github.com>

specs.title: should load the application successfully
should display initial empty state
should display loan form
should display loan list section
should display summary section with zero values
should display empty message when no loans exist
should have correct form field placeholders
should create a loan application successfully
should reset form after successful creation
should create multiple loan applications
should calculate monthly payment correctly
should persist loans in localStorage
should display action buttons for pending loans
should approve a pending loan
should update total approved amount when approving multiple loans
should reject a pending loan
should not add to total approved amount when rejecting
should auto-approve loan when amount ≤ $100,000 AND term ≤ 60 months
should auto-reject loan when amount > $100,000
should auto-reject loan when term > 60 months
should delete a pending loan
should delete an approved loan
should delete only the selected loan when multiple exist
should not create loan with empty applicant name
should not create loan with zero amount
should not create loan with zero term
should not create loan with negative amount
should not create loan with negative interest rate
should create loan at auto-approve boundary (exactly $100,000 and 60 months)
should auto-reject loan just above amount boundary ($100,001)
should auto-reject loan just above term boundary (61 months)
should handle applicant names with special characters
should handle very large loan amounts
should handle very long term periods
should handle zero interest rate
should handle corrupted localStorage data gracefully
should persist loans after page refresh
should handle rapid form submissions
should handle multiple status changes
